price: 49.Kaadu usun (munaafiqhiin kinnuk) cakki loonum sinnik yeexegeenik, sissikuk oggolc marah anuk kaá fanah yamaaten cakkil meklam kaak (Nabii kinnuk) yaaxigeenimih sabbatah.
arabic: وَإِن يَكُن لَّهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ يَأۡتُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ مُذۡعِنِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yakun lahumu al-ḥaqu yatū ilayhi mudh'ʿinīna
